verses.verse: ALEPH <S%H835><s%>. Blessed are they that are <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, Who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, That <S%H1875>seek<s%> him with the whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Yea <S%H6466><s%>, they do no <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%>; They <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>, That we should <S%H8104>observe<s%> them <S%H3966>diligently<s%>.
Oh <S%H305>that<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> were <S%H3559>established<s%> To <S%H8104>observe<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>!
Then shall I not be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>, When I have <S%H5027>respect<s%> unto all thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thee with <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>, When I <S%H3925>learn<s%> thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments<s%>.
I will <S%H8104>observe<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>: Oh <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me not <S%H3966>utterly<s%>.
BETH <S%H5288><s%>. Wherewith shall a young man <S%H2135>cleanse<s%> his <S%H734>way<s%>? By taking <S%H8104>heed<s%> thereto according to thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
With my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%> have I <S%H1875>sought<s%> <S%H7686>thee<s%>: Oh let me not wander from thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
Thy <S%H565>word<s%> have I <S%H6845>laid<s%> up in my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, That I might not sin against <S%H2398>thee<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> art <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah: <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
With my <S%H8193>lips<s%> have I <S%H5608>declared<s%> All the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
I have <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%>, As much as <S%H5921>in<s%> all <S%H1952>riches<s%>.
I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>, And have <S%H5027>respect<s%> unto thy <S%H734>ways<s%>.
I will <S%H8173>delight<s%> myself in thy <S%H2708>statutes<s%>: I will not <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
GIMEL <S%H1580><s%>. Deal bountifully with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that I may <S%H2421>live<s%>; So will I <S%H8104>observe<s%> thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
Open <S%H1540><s%> thou mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that I may <S%H5027>behold<s%> Wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%> out of thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
I am a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H5641>Hide<s%> not thy commandments from <S%H4687>me<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1638>breaketh<s%> for the <S%H8375>longing<s%> That it hath unto thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> at all <S%H6256>times<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> that are <S%H779>cursed<s%>, That do <S%H7686>wander<s%> from thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
Take <S%H1556><s%> away from me <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H937>contempt<s%>; For I have <S%H5341>kept<s%> thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
Princes <S%H8269><s%> also <S%H3427>sat<s%> and <S%H1696>talked<s%> against <S%H5650>me<s%>; But thy servant did <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
Thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%> also are my <S%H8191>delight<s%> And my <S%H582>counsellors<s%>.
DALETH <S%H5315><s%>. My soul <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> unto the <S%H6083>dust<s%>: <S%H2421>Quicken<s%> thou me according to thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
I <S%H5608>declared<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and thou <S%H6030>answeredst<s%> <S%H3925>me<s%>: Teach me thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
Make me to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>: So shall I <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on thy wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1811>melteth<s%> for <S%H8424>heaviness<s%>: <S%H6965>Strengthen<s%> thou me according unto thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
Remove <S%H5493><s%> from me the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>; And grant me thy <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H2603>graciously<s%>.
I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H530>faithfulness<s%>: Thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> have I set before <S%H7737>me<s%>.
I <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%>: O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, put me not to <S%H954>shame<s%>.
I will <S%H7323>run<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, When thou shalt <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
HE <S%H3384><s%>. Teach <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>; And I shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> it unto the <S%H6118>end<s%>.
Give me <S%H995>understanding<s%>, and I shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>; <S%H8104>Yea<s%>, I shall observe it with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Make me to <S%H1869>go<s%> in the <S%H5410>path<s%> of thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>; For therein do I <S%H2654>delight<s%>.
Incline <S%H5186><s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%>, And not to <S%H1215>covetousness<s%>.
Turn <S%H5674>away<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7200>beholding<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, And <S%H2421>quicken<s%> me in thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
Confirm <S%H6965><s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%>, Which is in order unto the fear of <S%H3374>thee<s%>.
Turn <S%H5674>away<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%> whereof I am <S%H3025>afraid<s%>; For thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> are <S%H2896>good<s%>.
Behold <S%H8373><s%>, I have longed after thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>: <S%H2421>Quicken<s%> me in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
VAV <S%H2617><s%>. Let thy lovingkindnesses also <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, Even thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%>, according to thy <S%H565>word<s%>.
So shall I <S%H1697>have<s%> an <S%H6030>answer<s%> for him that <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%> <S%H982>me<s%>; For I trust in thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
And <S%H5337>take<s%> not the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H3966>utterly<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; For I have <S%H3176>hoped<s%> in thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>.
So shall I <S%H8104>observe<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> For <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
And I shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> at <S%H7342>liberty<s%>; For I have <S%H1875>sought<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
I will also <S%H1696>speak<s%> of thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%> before <S%H4428>kings<s%>, And shall not be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>.
And I will <S%H8173>delight<s%> myself in thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, Which I have <S%H157>loved<s%>.
I will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> also unto thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which I have <S%H157>loved<s%>; And I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
ZAYIN <S%H2142><s%>. Remember the <S%H1697>word<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, Because thou hast made me to <S%H3176>hope<s%>.
This is my <S%H5165>comfort<s%> in my <S%H6040>affliction<s%>; For thy <S%H565>word<s%> hath quickened <S%H2421>me<s%>.
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have had me <S%H3966>greatly<s%> in <S%H3887>derision<s%>: Yet have I not <S%H5186>swerved<s%> from thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And have comforted <S%H5162>myself<s%>.
Hot <S%H2152>indignation<s%> hath taken <S%H270>hold<s%> upon <S%H7563>me<s%>, Because of the wicked that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
Thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%> have been my <S%H2158>songs<s%> In the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H4033>pilgrimage<s%>.
I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, And have <S%H8104>observed<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
This I have <S%H5341>had<s%>, Because I have kept thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
HHETH <S%H3068><s%>. Jehovah is my <S%H2506>portion<s%>: I have <S%H559>said<s%> that I would <S%H8104>observe<s%> thy <S%H1697>words<s%>.
I <S%H2470>entreated<s%> thy <S%H6440>favor<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>: Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me according to thy <S%H565>word<s%>.
I <S%H2803>thought<s%> on my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, And <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> unto thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
I made <S%H2363>haste<s%>, and <S%H4102>delayed<s%> <S%H8104>not<s%>, To observe thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
The <S%H2256>cords<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H5749>wrapped<s%> me <S%H7911>round<s%>; But I have not forgotten thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
At <S%H2676>midnight<s%> I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thee Because of thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>.
I am a <S%H2270>companion<s%> of all them that <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H8104>thee<s%>, And of them that observe thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
The <S%H776>earth<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, is <S%H4390>full<s%> of thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>: <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
TETH <S%H6213><s%>. Thou hast dealt <S%H2896>well<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, according unto thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
Teach <S%H3925><s%> me <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H2940>judgment<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; For I have <S%H539>believed<s%> in thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
Before I was <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> I went <S%H7683>astray<s%>; But now I <S%H8104>observe<s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%>.
Thou art <S%H2896>good<s%>, and doest <S%H2895>good<s%>; <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H2950>forged<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> against <S%H3820>me<s%>: With my whole heart will I <S%H5341>keep<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H2954>fat<s%> as <S%H2459>grease<s%>; But I <S%H8173>delight<s%> in thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> for me that I have been <S%H6031>afflicted<s%>; That I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> unto me Than <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
YODH <S%H3027><s%>. Thy hands have <S%H6213>made<s%> me and <S%H6213>fashioned<s%> <S%H995>me<s%>: Give me understanding, that I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
They that <S%H3373>fear<s%> thee shall <S%H7200>see<s%> me and be <S%H8055>glad<s%>, Because I have <S%H3176>hoped<s%> in thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H6664>righteous<s%>, And that in <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> thou hast afflicted <S%H6031>me<s%>.
Let <S%H2617><s%>, I pray thee, thy lovingkindness be for my <S%H5162>comfort<s%>, According to thy <S%H565>word<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>.
Let thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H2421>me<s%>, that I may live; For thy <S%H8451>law<s%> is my <S%H8191>delight<s%>.
Let the <S%H2086>proud<s%> be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>; For they have <S%H5791>overthrown<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%>: But I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
Let those that <S%H3373>fear<s%> thee <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto <S%H3045>me<s%>; And they shall know thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
Let my <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, That I be not put to <S%H954>shame<s%>.
KAPH <S%H5315><s%>. My soul <S%H3615>fainteth<s%> for thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%>; But I <S%H3176>hope<s%> in thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> for thy <S%H565>word<s%>, While I <S%H559>say<s%>, When wilt thou comfort <S%H5162>me<s%>?
For I am become like a <S%H4997>wine-skin<s%> in the <S%H7008>smoke<s%>; Yet do I not <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
How many are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>? When wilt thou <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> on them that persecute <S%H7291>me<s%>?
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H3738>digged<s%> <S%H7882>pits<s%> for <S%H8451>me<s%>, Who are not according to thy law.
All thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> are <S%H530>faithful<s%>: They <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%>; Help thou <S%H5826>me<s%>.
They had <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%> me upon <S%H776>earth<s%>; But I <S%H5800>forsook<s%> not thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me after thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>; So shall I <S%H8104>observe<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
LAMEDH <S%H5769><s%>. For ever, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Thy <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H5324>settled<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> is unto <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>: Thou hast <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and it <S%H5975>abideth<s%>.
They <S%H5975>abide<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> according to thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>; For all things are thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
Unless <S%H3884><s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%> had been my <S%H8191>delight<s%>, I should then have <S%H6>perished<s%> in mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
I will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>; For with them thou hast quickened <S%H2421>me<s%>.
I am <S%H3467>thine<s%>, save <S%H1875>me<s%>; For I have sought thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H6>me<s%>, to destroy <S%H995>me<s%>; But I will consider thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> of all <S%H8502>perfection<s%>; But thy <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7342>broad<s%>.
MEM <S%H157><s%>. Oh how love I thy <S%H8451>law<s%>! It is my <S%H7881>meditation<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> make me <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>; For they are ever with <S%H5769>me<s%>.
I have more <S%H7919>understanding<s%> than all my <S%H3925>teachers<s%>; For thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> are my <S%H7881>meditation<s%>.
I <S%H995>understand<s%> more than the <S%H2205>aged<s%>, Because I have <S%H5341>kept<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
I have <S%H3607>refrained<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from every <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H734>way<s%>, That I might <S%H8104>observe<s%> thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
I have not <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside from thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>; For thou hast taught <S%H3384>me<s%>.
How <S%H4452>sweet<s%> are thy <S%H565>words<s%> unto my <S%H2441>taste<s%>! <S%H1706>Yea<s%>, sweeter than honey to my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>!
Through thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%> I get <S%H995>understanding<s%>: Therefore I <S%H8130>hate<s%> every <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H734>way<s%>.
NUN <S%H1697><s%>. Thy word is a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> unto my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, And <S%H216>light<s%> unto my <S%H5410>path<s%>.
I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, and have <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> <S%H8104>it<s%>, That I will observe thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>.
I am <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> very <S%H3966>much<s%>: <S%H2421>Quicken<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, according unto thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
Accept <S%H7521><s%>, I beseech <S%H5071>thee<s%>, the freewill-offerings of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8548>continually<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand<s%>; Yet do I not <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H5414>laid<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> for <S%H8582>me<s%>; Yet have I not gone astray from thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
Thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> have I taken as a <S%H5157>heritage<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; For they are the <S%H8342>rejoicing<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
I have <S%H5186>inclined<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%> For <S%H6118>ever<s%>, even unto the end.
SAMEKH <S%H8130><s%>. I hate them that are of a double <S%H5588>mind<s%>; But thy <S%H8451>law<s%> do I <S%H157>love<s%>.
